meta.title: GMIJ - Personal Introduction
meta.description: GMIJ's personal introduction, showcasing 15 years of .NET development experience, 5 years of management experience, and contributions to open source projects.
meta.keywords: GMIJ, .NET, DevOps, TeamCity, R&D, management, open source, AI projects

header.name: GMIJ
header.subtitle: 15 years in .NET development, 5 years in management, passionate about open source and AI-driven innovation.

items.title: Full-Stack Development
items.description: 15 years of development experience (2002-2017), specializing in .NET development. A full-stack engineer with high standards for code quality and regular refactoring practices.

items.title: DevOps Expert
items.description: Proficient in DevOps practices, skilled in using TeamCity for continuous integration and deployment, dedicated to improving R&D efficiency.

items.title: Team Leadership
items.description: 5 years of management experience (2017-2023), served as R&D Director (20+ team members) and Operations Director (70+ on-site operations team), skilled in building teams from scratch.

items.title: Performance Growth
items.description: Expert in R&D efficiency improvement and operations management optimization, increased annual operations contract value from 1M to nearly 20M CNY. Management philosophy: Leading teams to continuous victories.

leadProjects.name: DynamicWallpaper
leadProjects.description: A powerful dynamic wallpaper application with multiple wallpaper sources and customizable settings.

leadProjects.name: Audio3A_CSharp
leadProjects.description: A fully AI-written .NET native audio 3A processing SDK providing noise reduction, echo cancellation, and more.

leadProjects.name: Green Software Hub
leadProjects.description: A fully AI-written resource download site providing green software download services.

leadProjects.name: Children Image
leadProjects.description: AI Children's Art - A fully AI-written children's handout generator helping kids create beautiful handouts quickly.

leadProjects.name: ZerotierFix
leadProjects.description: A fully AI-enhanced ZeroTier Android client for personal VPN services.

contributorProjects.name: SmartSql
contributorProjects.description: High-performance, extensible .NET ORM framework supporting multiple databases and dynamic SQL.

contributorProjects.name: Ant Design Blazor
contributorProjects.description: Enterprise-class UI components based on Ant Design for Blazor.
